Title: #110 TOP EPISODE: 5 Easy Brain Breaks (Encore)
Description:
In this encore episode Rob Donatelli talks about the Brain Breaks phenomenon and gives teachers five ideas for brain breaks he uses in his high school classroom.

Read the show notes at http://www.coolcatteacher.com/e60. We'll be taking a break from the show for a few weeks in July, so we hope you can catch up on back episodes. Meanwhile, enjoy the summer if you're in the US or Northern Hemisphere. We'll be back soon for season 2 of the 10-Minute Teacher. Thank you so much for your support.  

If you want some cool things over the summer, remember you can support us over at www.patreon.com/coolcatteacher.
